body:
Comment 2 by **jjinux@google.com**: 
Thanks for the response.  I've been working my way through the tutorials very carefully,
and that's the first time I've seen that syntax.  I think it's reasonable for people to
read "Effective Go" before reading the language specification.  Hence, there will be
many other programmers like me that won't recognize that syntax.  Hence, it's probably
worth adding a sentence or two to Effective Go mentioning what that syntax is.
